select
from t_mall_group_join j left join t_mall_order o on o.id = j.order_id where o.order_status = 2 and j.group_buy_id=#{groupBuyId} and (j.id = #{id} or j.p_join_id=#{id})

select j.id,j.group_buy_id as groupBuyId, j.join_user_id as joinUserId ,j.join_type as joinType,j.join_time as joinTime ,j.order_id as orderId,j.order_detail_id as orderDetailId from t_mall_group_join j left join t_mall_order o on o.id = j.order_id where o.order_status = 2 and j.group_buy_id = #{groupBuyId} and (j.p_join_id = #{joinId} or j.id= #{joinId}) order by j.join_type desc , j.join_time
